boardgame.name: The Game: Extreme
ザ・ゲーム
boardgame.description: The Game: Extreme features cooperative gameplay similar to The Game, with all players working together to discard all of the cards in the deck onto four discard piles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;What's new in The Game: Extreme are 28 instructions on the cards themselves that affect the rules of the game while they're in play, increasing the difficulty of completing the game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or rather, The Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: DJ138: The Game Extreme (2016) Steffen Benndorf + Reinhard Staupe

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
